# Personalisation and data set import
## Question1
```{r}
courses <- read_csv(here("data", "courses.csv"))
```
## Question 2
```{r}
courses |>
  arrange(course) |>
  rename(
    "course name" = course,
    "identifier" = course_id,
    "module" = module,
    "number of exams" = nb_grades  
  ) |>
  kable()
```

## Question3
```{r}
students <- read_csv(
  here("data", "students.csv"),
  col_types = cols(
    id = col_integer(),
    group = col_factor(),
    birth_date = col_date(),
    sex = col_factor()
  )
)
```

## Question4
```{r}
grades <- read_delim(
  here("data", "grades.csv"),
  delim = ":",      
  na = "_",         
  col_types = cols( 
    id = col_integer(),
    course_id = col_integer(),
    grade = col_double()
  )
)
```
